Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, reflecting over years of dedication and innovation. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $18000. This opportunity is not to be missed, as it represents an extraordinary chance to acquire something truly special. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless transaction and unparalleled customer service. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
